message: Well if it isn't Brad B! So glad you could join us today.
action1: Thank you! Glad to be here!

message: We picked up a bottle of Lagavulin 16 year for you to enjoy as you peruse the gallery today.
I do. I really do. It's totally not a bribe intended to sway you into voting my gallery first place in the contest.
action1: I would never think that. You're a straight shooter!
